Author: jl777c#5810
Content: recent updates allow a 100% private chain to be notarized. ok, so that makes it so the notarization tx are not z-transactions, but only notaries can even send a transparent tx. the coinbase is also required to be transparent, but all else must be a z transaction. Once dPoW is active, this will be the most private blockchain with BTC level security. Unfortunately, it cant to CC, or even multisig. it is purely a z-transaction coin. which also means it is basically technically complete now!

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: Its emission will be 200 million coins, with a halving every 10 months or so. current blockreward and for the next 9 months is 256 PIRATE. #pirate for more info.
